RelatedSentence: Even as the Tiruchirapalli City Corporation is planning to build a modern fish market at Kuzhumani Road , the city 's major fish market at Puthur continues to languish without infrastructure and functions amidst poor sanitary conditions .
Traders say the main fish market in the city receives over 50 lorries of seafood on most days , especially on Saturdays and Sundays from coastal areas in Nagapattinam and Pudukottai districts .
